Uses of Class
camzup.core.Gradient

Packages that use Gradient 
Package Description
camzup.core  
camzup.pfriendly  

  • Uses of Gradient in camzup.core

    Methods in camzup.core that return Gradient 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Gradient Gradient.append​(int color)
    Appends a color at step 1.0 .
    Gradient Gradient.append​(Color color)
    Appends a color at step 1.0 .
    Gradient Gradient.append​(Gradient.Key key)
    Appends a color key to this gradient.
    Gradient Gradient.append​(java.lang.String color)
    Appends a color at step 1.0 .
    Gradient Gradient.appendAll​(int... colors)
    Appends a list of color integers to this gradient.
    Gradient Gradient.appendAll​(Color... colors)
    Appends a list of colors to this gradient.
    Gradient Gradient.appendAll​(Gradient.Key... keys)
    Appends color keys to this gradient.
    Gradient Gradient.appendAll​(java.lang.String... colors)
    Appends a list of color strings to this gradient.
    Gradient Gradient.distribute​(java.util.List<Gradient.Key> keyArr)
    Distributes this gradient's color keys evenly through the range [0.0, 1.0] .
    static Gradient Gradient.paletteMagma​(Gradient target)
    Returns the Magma color palette, consisting of 16 keys.
    static Gradient Gradient.paletteRgb​(Gradient target)
    Returns seven primary and secondary colors: red, yellow, green, cyan, blue, magenta and red.
    static Gradient Gradient.paletteViridis​(Gradient target)
    Returns the Viridis color palette, consisting of 16 keys.
    Gradient Gradient.reset()
    Resets this gradient to an initial state, with two color keys: clear black at 0.0 and opaque white at 1.0 .
    Gradient Gradient.reverse​(java.util.List<Gradient.Key> keyList)
    Reverses the gradient.
    Gradient Gradient.sort​(java.util.List<Color> clrList)
    Sorts the gradient according to a property of the colors in each key.
    Gradient Gradient.sort​(java.util.List<Color> clrList, java.util.Comparator<Color> sorter)
    Sorts the gradient according to a property of the colors in each key.

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Gradient Gradient.paletteMagma​(Gradient target)
    Returns the Magma color palette, consisting of 16 keys.
    static Gradient Gradient.paletteRgb​(Gradient target)
    Returns seven primary and secondary colors: red, yellow, green, cyan, blue, magenta and red.
    static Gradient Gradient.paletteViridis​(Gradient target)

    Generates a conic gradient, where the factor rotates on the z axis around an origin point.

    Generates a conic gradient, where the factor rotates on the z axis around an origin point.
    static processing.core.PImage ZImage.falseColor​(processing.core.PImage target, Gradient grd)
    Recolors an image in-place with a color gradient.
    static processing.core.PImage ZImage.linear​(float xOrigin, float yOrigin, float xDest, float yDest, Gradient grd, processing.core.PImage target)
    Generates a linear gradient from an origin point to a destination point.
    static processing.core.PImage ZImage.linear​(Vec2 origin, Vec2 dest, Gradient grd, processing.core.PImage target)
    Generates a linear gradient from an origin point to a destination point.
